Aurora Warms the Night

item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: Felicia and KJ's Story: Finding Shelter with Aurora Warms...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

Felicia and KJ's Story: Finding Shelter with Aurora Warms the Night

Our outreach team works daily to find solutions for our clients needs. Beyond providing food and shelter for 100's of people per day, we offer case management and housing services. Our goal is to help people take the next step in their lives by connecting them with the proper services they need and when we are successful everyone wins. We helped Felicia and KJ move into an aprtment. This is one successful sto...ry and with your generosity we can continue this mission.

"First off I want to thank all of you for the help. My fiance and I are finally - after almost a year of trying - moving into our apartment tomorrow we would have not accomplished this without the help of the team and program. For this Thanksgiving and for the future ones as well I am so very thankful for all of you.

Thank you, Felicia and Kj

See MoreCheck out Giving Tuesday by Aurora Warms The Night!

item.title: As we move into the Christmas season please consider using...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

As we move into the Christmas season please consider using Amazon Smile for all of your online purchases smile.amazon.com/ch/27-4728487 & support Aurora Warms the Night. Nonprofits are suffering this year with decreasing financial support. Every little bit helps us continue our mission to serve those living in homelessness along the Colfax Corridor here in Aurora, CO.
We also have an Amazon Charity list now! It's now even easier to provide needed items to AWTN.
https://smile.amazon.com/…/1Z5APO3ML…/ref=smi_ext_lnk_lcl_cl

smile.amazon.com

AmazonSmile: You shop. Amazon gives.

AmazonSmile donates to your favorite charity on Charity List purchases and millions of eligible items at smile.amazon.com.AmazonSmile donates to your favorite charity on Charity List purchases and millions of eligible items at smile.amazon.com.

item.title: We will be giving away winter coats, gloves and other winter...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is asking for donations.

We will be giving away winter coats, gloves and other winter items starting next week - T and Th 2-5pm at our office. Please call to schedule an appointment time

Donate
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: We are getting prepared for the winter months as we are seeing a...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is supporting Aurora Warms the Night.

We are getting prepared for the winter months as we are seeing a 30% increase in homelessness in Denver. We are on the front line and your donation allows us to properly serve these individuals. Thank you!

Cold Weather Shelter Funds Fundraiser by Aurora Warms the NightThis winter we will be confronted with a 30% increase in people on the streets without access to shelter or food....

Help us today as we provide shelter, winter clothing, food and case management to individuals on East Colfax. Continue Reading$170 raised of $8,000
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night

item.title: WE NEED MEALS! Please consider signing up to provide dinner on a...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

WE NEED MEALS!
Please consider signing up to provide dinner on a Tuesday or Thursday evening. Drop off is at our NEW office at 9260 E Colfax Ave. around 4:45 pm. You are not expected to serve the meals just drop & go. Our team will take the meal out to our folks living on the street along the Colfax Corridor.
If you have any questions please email Leah at volunteers@awtnco.org
Thanks as always for your partnership & love towards our friends experiencing homelessness. We couldn't do what we do without all of you!
https://mealtrain.com/58ozoy

This meal sign up is a little different than originally intended. We don't have our shower trailer up & running yet due to COVID, but we are continuing to provide meals to our friends on Colfax in a manner that is similar to take out. We are in need of meals packed in single serving to-go bags/boxes...

mealtrain.com

item.title: This Thursday Aug 20th we are in need of a to go meal for 50...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

This Thursday Aug 20th we are in need of a to go meal for 50 people. Please visit https://mealtrain.com/58ozoy for more details, to sign up, or to see all of our available dates.

A special thanks to all of our volunteers who have continued to support us during this difficult time of outreach. We are so thankful for each of you & the folks we serve are forever grateful!

This meal sign up is a little different than originally intended. We don't have our shower trailer up & running yet due to COVID, but we are continuing to provide meals to our friends on Colfax in a manner that is similar to take out. We are in need of meals packed in single serving to-go bags/boxes...

item.title: We are in need of To-Go Meals on Monday & Thursday evenings....
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night is feeling thankful.

We are in need of To-Go Meals on Monday & Thursday evenings. If you can put together 40-50 sack meals please follow the link & choose an evening. The meals are dropped off at the office & our staff takes them out to our friends on Colfax. Thanks for partnering with us. https://mealtrain.com/58ozoy

This meal sign up is a little different than originally intended. We don't have our shower trailer up & running yet due to COVID, but we are continuing to provide meals to our friends on Colfax in a manner that is similar to take out. We are in need of meals packed in single serving to-go bags/boxes...

item.title: We still have some openings for summer lunches. We need 50-100...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

We still have some openings for summer lunches. We need 50-100 sack lunches to handout Monday through Friday until July 10th. You don't have to serve them just prepare them & drop them off. Visit https://mealtrain.com/0484y9 to pick your date.

Thank-you so much for your support of Summer Lunches. If you have been involved in previous years you will notice that this year we are doing things a little different in the realm of COVID-19. This year all meals will be "to-go" style.

mealtrain.com

item.title: The box of material has been picked up....I have a box of random...
item.content:encoded:
Aurora Warms the Night

The box of material has been picked up....I have a box of random material. If any of our supporters on here are making masks & would like it I’d love to donate it to you. PS We are always in need of masculine masks as well!!
Unfortunately I don’t have any elastic.
Shoot me an email at volunteers@awtnco.org
item.author: Aurora Warms the Night
